name: iCloud for Windows 12.5
available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store

advisories.available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Jzhu, Ye Zhang(@co0py_Cat) of Baidu Security

advisories.available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved bounds checking.
